scripts.build: npm run browser && npm run jsdoc
scripts.lint: jshint index.js lib/album.js lib/artist.js lib/lastfm.js lib/playlist.js lib/queue.js lib/similar.js lib/spotify.js lib/track.js web/web.js test/test.js && standard index.js lib/album.js lib/artist.js lib/lastfm.js lib/playlist.js lib/queue.js lib/similar.js lib/spotify.js lib/track.js web/web.js test/test.js
scripts.tests: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.web: npm run browser && npm run open
scripts.doc: npm run jsdoc && npm run man
scripts.jsdoc: rm -rf doc && jsdoc -c .jsdocrc -d doc README.md index.js lib/album.js lib/artist.js lib/lastfm.js lib/playlist.js lib/queue.js lib/spotify.js lib/track.js lib/lastfm.js
scripts.commit: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a -m "Updated `git status | sed -n '/modified:/ {s/^[[:space:]]*modified:[[:space:]]*//;s/\.txt$//;s/\.md$//;s/\.html$//;s/\/index$//;p;q;}'`"
scripts.amend: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend --no-edit
scripts.reword: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend
scripts.push: git --no-pager status && git pull --rebase && git push
